body: I see why it takes so long to translate these manga's to english it's because not only do you have to translate you have to kinda rewrite a lot of it. I've been translating some of these so i can read the raws and a lot of it doesn't make sense for example it will say "He" instead of "She" stuff like that. Some of it is so bad it's not worth translating because you would have to rewrite the whole thing.
What is wrong with these woman they fuck anyone who have a dick
